short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sitedux browser extension enables user to save websites which can then be added to their personalized Sitedux dashboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sitedux extension helps you to save and forward the website URL to your personalized Sitedux dashboard. 

The Sitedux dashboard is a productivity tool to organize your favorite websites on a web page so they're instantly accessible with one click. 

The Sitedux extension with the Sitedux dashboard helps you save valuable websites you find on the web that you'd like to revisit in future without worrying you'll forget them. Websites received from the Sitedux extension can be added to the user's Sitedux dashboard in the category, list and order of appearance of the user's choosing.

Features:

- Save any web page link online. Any web content that you bookmark gets saved inside your Sitedux dashboard with just one click.

- Organize your favorite links on your Sitedux dashboard

- The data won't be shared or used for anything other than the user's own purposes.
